view.name: zks_information_schema_columns
view.def:
SELECT
table_schema, table_name, column_name,
-- chk routines.xml (CASE data_type WHEN '"trigger"' THEN 'trigger' WHEN 'boolean' THEN 'bool' WHEN 'integer' THEN 'int' WHEN 'character varying' THEN 'string' WHEN 'timestamp with time zone' THEN 'timestamptz' WHEN 'timestamp without time zone' THEN 'timestamp' WHEN 'double precision' THEN 'float' ELSE data_type END ) AS data_type,
character_maximum_length, (is_nullable='YES') as is_nullable,
regexp_replace(regexp_replace(column_default, '::[a-z ]+', '', 'g'), ',[ ]+',',','g') AS column_default
FROM information_schema.columns
